data.text:
Bernard Arnault's legacy: Can his children sustain LVMH - the world's largest luxury conglomerate empire?

In an effort to secure LVMH's future, Arnault has raised the retirement age for the CEO and chair to 80. He has also created a corporate structure that ensures his family's control of the company.

22 Sep, 2023, 05:43 PM IST
